segments.source_content: This configuration applies to all [main themes](./overview.mdx).

translations.zh-hant: 此配置適用於所有[主要主題](./overview.mdx)。

segments.source_content: The classic theme provides by default light and dark mode support, with a navbar switch for the user.

translations.zh-hant: 經典主題預設支援淺色與深色模式，並在導覽列提供切換開關。

segments.source_content: It is possible to customize the color mode support within the `colorMode` object.

translations.zh-hant: 可透過 `colorMode` 物件自訂色彩模式支援功能。

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `defaultMode` | 'light' \| 'dark' | `'light'` | The color mode when user first visits the site. | | `disableSwitch` | `boolean` | `false` | Hides the switch in the navbar. Useful if you want to support a single color mode. | | `respectPrefersColorScheme` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether to use the `prefers-color-scheme` media-query, using user system preferences, instead of the hardcoded `defaultMode`. |

:::warning

With `respectPrefersColorScheme: true`, the `defaultMode` is overridden by user system preferences.

If you only want to support one color mode, you likely want to ignore user system preferences.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

當 `respectPrefersColorScheme: true` 時，`defaultMode` 會被使用者系統偏好設定覆寫。

若您僅想支援單一色彩模式，建議忽略使用者系統偏好設定。

:::

segments.source_content: You can configure a default image that will be used for your meta tag, in particular `og:image` and `twitter:image`.

translations.zh-hant: 可配置預設圖片用於元標籤，特別是 `og:image` 與 `twitter:image`。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `image` | `string` | `undefined` | The meta image URL for the site. Relative to your site's "static" directory. Cannot be SVGs. Can be external URLs too. |
You can configure additional HTML metadata (and override existing ones).

translations.zh-hant: 可配置額外HTML元數據（並覆寫現有設定）。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `metadata` | `Metadata[]` | `[]` | Any field will be directly passed to the `<meta />` tag. Possible fields include `id`, `name`, `property`, `content`, `itemprop`, etc. |

Sometimes you want to announce something in your website. Just for such a case, you can add an announcement bar. This is a non-fixed and optionally dismissible panel above the navbar. All configuration are in the `announcementBar` object.

translations.zh-hant: 有時您需要在網站發布公告。為此可添加公告欄——這是位於導覽列上方、非固定且可選擇關閉的面板。所有配置皆位於 `announcementBar` 物件中。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `id` | `string` | `'announcement-bar'` | Any value that will identify this message. |
| `content` | `string` | `''` | The text content of the announcement. HTML will be interpolated. |
| `backgroundColor` | `string` | `'#fff'` | Background color of the entire bar. |
| `textColor` | `string` | `'#000'` | Announcement text color. |
| `isCloseable` | `boolean` | `true` | Whether this announcement can be dismissed with a '×' button. |

| Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `title` | `string` | `undefined` | Title for the navbar. | | `logo` | _See below_ | `undefined` | Customization of the logo object. | | `items` | `NavbarItem[]` | `[]` | A list of navbar items. See specification below. | | `hideOnScroll` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether the navbar is hidden when the user scrolls down. | | `style` | 'primary' \| 'dark' | Same as theme | Sets the navbar style, ignoring the dark/light theme. |

The logo can be placed in [static folder](static-assets.mdx). Logo URL is set to base URL of your site by default. Although you can specify your own URL for the logo, if it is an external link, it will open in a new tab. In addition, you can override a value for the target attribute of logo link, it can come in handy if you are hosting docs website in a subdirectory of your main website, and in which case you probably do not need a link in the logo to the main website will open in a new tab.

translations.zh-hant: 標誌可置於[靜態資料夾](static-assets.mdx)。標誌URL預設為網站根路徑。您可自訂標誌URL，若為外部連結將在新分頁開啟。此外，可覆寫標誌連結的target屬性值，當文件網站託管於主站子目錄時特別有用——此情況下您可能不希望標誌連結至主站時開啟新分頁。

segments.source_content: To improve dark mode support, you can also set a different logo for this mode.

translations.zh-hant: 為強化深色模式支援，可為此模式設定不同標誌。

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `alt` | `string` | `undefined` | Alt tag for the logo image. | | `src` | `string` | **Required** | URL to the logo image. Base URL is appended by default. | | `srcDark` | `string` | `logo.src` | An alternative image URL to use in dark mode. | | `href` | `string` | `siteConfig.baseUrl` | Link to navigate to when the logo is clicked. | | `width` | string \| number | `undefined` | Specifies the `width` attribute. | | `height` | string \| number | `undefined` | Specifies the `height` attribute. | | `target` | `string` | Calculated based on `href` (external links will open in a new tab, all others in the current one). | The `target` attribute of the link; controls whether the link is opened in a new tab, the current one, or otherwise. | | `className` | `string` | `undefined` | CSS class applied to the image. | | `style` | `object` | `undefined` | CSS inline style object. React/JSX flavor, using camelCase properties. |
You can add items to the navbar via `themeConfig.navbar.items`.

translations.zh-hant: 可透過 `themeConfig.navbar.items` 添加項目至導覽列。

segments.source_content: The items can have different behaviors based on the `type` field. The sections below will introduce you to all the types of navbar items available.

translations.zh-hant: 項目行為可依據 `type` 欄位而異。以下章節將介紹所有可用的導覽列項目類型。

segments.source_content: By default, Navbar items are regular links (internal or external).

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下，導航欄項目是常規連結（內部或外部）。

segments.source_content: React Router should automatically apply active link styling to links, but you can use `activeBasePath` in edge cases. For cases in which a link should be active on several different paths (such as when you have multiple doc folders under the same sidebar), you can use `activeBaseRegex`. `activeBaseRegex` is a more flexible alternative to `activeBasePath` and takes precedence over it -- Docusaurus parses it into a regular expression that is tested against the current URL.

translations.zh-hant: React Router 應會自動為連結套用活動連結樣式，但在邊緣情況下可使用 `activeBasePath`。若某連結需在多個不同路徑下保持活動狀態（例如當同一側邊欄下有多個文件夾時），可使用 `activeBaseRegex`。`activeBaseRegex` 是比 `activeBasePath` 更靈活的替代方案且優先級更高——Docusaurus 會將其解析為正則表達式並與當前 URL 進行匹配測試。

segments.source_content: Outbound (external) links automatically get `target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"` attributes.

translations.zh-hant: 外站（外部）連結會自動添加 `target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"` 屬性。

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `type` | `'default'` | Optional | Sets the type of this item to a link. | | `label` | `string` | **Required** | The name to be shown for this item. | | `html` | `string` | Optional | Same as `label`, but renders pure HTML instead of text content. | | `to` | `string` | **Required** | Client-side routing, used for navigating within the website. The baseUrl will be automatically prepended to this value. | | `href` | `string` | **Required** | A full-page navigation, used for navigating outside of the website. **Only one of `to` or `href` should be used.** | | `prependBaseUrlToHref` | `boolean` | `false` | Prepends the baseUrl to `href` values. | | `position` | 'left' \| 'right' | `'left'` | The side of the navbar this item should appear on. | | `activeBasePath` | `string` | `to` / `href` | To apply the active class styling on all routes starting with this path. This usually isn't necessary. | | `activeBaseRegex` | `string` | `undefined` | Alternative to `activeBasePath` if required. | | `className` | `string` | `''` | Custom CSS class (for styling any item). |

:::note

In addition to the fields above, you can specify other arbitrary attributes that can be applied to a HTML link.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

除上述欄位外，您還可指定其他任意屬性應用於 HTML 連結。

:::

segments.source_content: Navbar items of the type `dropdown` has the additional `items` field, an inner array of navbar items.

translations.zh-hant: 類型為 `dropdown` 的導航欄項目具有額外的 `items` 欄位，即導航欄項目的內部陣列。

segments.source_content: Navbar dropdown items only accept the following **"link-like" item types**:

translations.zh-hant: 導航欄下拉選單項目僅接受以下**「類連結」項目類型**：

segments.source_content:
- [Navbar link](#navbar-link)
- [Navbar doc link](#navbar-doc-link)
- [Navbar docs version](#navbar-docs-version)
- [Navbar doc sidebar](#navbar-doc-sidebar)
- [Navbar with custom HTML](#navbar-with-custom-html)

translations.zh-hant:
- [導航欄連結](#navbar-link)
- [導航欄文件連結](#navbar-doc-link)
- [導航欄文件版本](#navbar-docs-version)
- [導航欄文件側邊欄](#navbar-doc-sidebar)
- [自訂 HTML 導航欄](#navbar-with-custom-html)

segments.source_content: Note that the dropdown base item is a clickable link as well, so this item can receive any of the props of a [plain navbar link](#navbar-link).

translations.zh-hant: 請注意，下拉選單基礎項目本身也是可點擊的連結，因此該項目可接收[純導航欄連結](#navbar-link)的任何屬性。

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `type` | `'dropdown'` | Optional | Sets the type of this item to a dropdown. | | `label` | `string` | **Required** | The name to be shown for this item. | | `items` | [LinkLikeItem](#navbar-dropdown)[] | **Required** | The items to be contained in the dropdown. | | `position` | 'left' \| 'right' | `'left'` | The side of the navbar this item should appear on. |

If you want to link to a specific doc, this special navbar item type will render the link to the doc of the provided `docId`. It will get the class `navbar__link--active` as long as you browse a doc of the same sidebar.

translations.zh-hant: 若需連結至特定文件，此特殊導航欄項目類型會渲染指向所提供 `docId` 文件的連結。只要您瀏覽同一側邊欄下的文件，該連結就會獲得 `navbar__link--active` 類別。

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `type` | `'doc'` | **Required** | Sets the type of this item to a doc link. | | `docId` | `string` | **Required** | The ID of the doc that this item links to. | | `label` | `string` | `docId` | The name to be shown for this item. | | `position` | 'left' \| 'right' | `'left'` | The side of the navbar this item should appear on. | | `docsPluginId` | `string` | `'default'` | The ID of the docs plugin that the doc belongs to. |

translations.zh-hant: #### 連結至側邊欄的導航欄 {#navbar-doc-sidebar}

segments.source_content: You can link a navbar item to the first document link (which can be a doc link or a generated category index) of a given sidebar without having to hardcode a doc ID.

translations.zh-hant: 您可將導航欄項目連結至指定側邊欄的第一個文件連結（可能是文件連結或自動生成的類別索引），而無需硬編碼文件 ID。

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `type` | `'docSidebar'` | **Required** | Sets the type of this navbar item to a sidebar's first document. | | `sidebarId` | `string` | **Required** | The ID of the sidebar that this item is linked to. | | `label` | `string` | First document link's sidebar label | The name to be shown for this item. | | `position` | 'left' \| 'right' | `'left'` | The side of the navbar this item should appear on. | | `docsPluginId` | `string` | `'default'` | The ID of the docs plugin that the sidebar belongs to. |

:::tip

Use this navbar item type if your sidebar is updated often and the order is not stable.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

當側邊欄頻繁更新且順序不穩定時，建議使用此導航欄項目類型。

:::
#### 導航欄文件版本下拉選單 {#navbar-docs-version-dropdown}

segments.source_content: If you use docs with versioning, this special navbar item type that will render a dropdown with all your site's available versions.

translations.zh-hant: 若使用版本化文件，此特殊導航欄項目類型會渲染包含所有可用版本的下拉選單。

segments.source_content: The user will be able to switch from one version to another, while staying on the same doc (as long as the doc ID is constant across versions).

translations.zh-hant: 使用者可在不同版本間切換，同時停留在同一文件（只要文件 ID 在各版本間保持一致）。

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `type` | `'docsVersionDropdown'` | **Required** | Sets the type of this item to a docs version dropdown. | | `position` | 'left' \| 'right' | `'left'` | The side of the navbar this item should appear on. | | `dropdownItemsBefore` | [LinkLikeItem](#navbar-dropdown)[] | `[]` | Add additional dropdown items at the beginning of the dropdown. | | `dropdownItemsAfter` | [LinkLikeItem](#navbar-dropdown)[] | `[]` | Add additional dropdown items at the end of the dropdown. | | `docsPluginId` | `string` | `'default'` | The ID of the docs plugin that the doc versioning belongs to. | | `dropdownActiveClassDisabled` | `boolean` | `false` | Do not add the link active class when browsing docs. |
If you use docs with versioning, this special navbar item type will link to the active/browsed version of your doc (depends on the current URL), and fallback to the latest version.

translations.zh-hant: 若您使用版本化文件，此特殊導覽列項目類型會連結至當前瀏覽的文件版本（依據網址判斷），並在無匹配版本時自動回退至最新版本。

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `type` | `'docsVersion'` | **Required** | Sets the type of this item to a doc version link. | | `label` | `string` | The active/latest version label. | The name to be shown for this item. | | `to` | `string` | The active/latest version. | The internal link that this item points to. | | `position` | 'left' \| 'right' | `'left'` | The side of the navbar this item should appear on. | | `docsPluginId` | `string` | `'default'` | The ID of the docs plugin that the doc versioning belongs to. |
If you use the [i18n feature](../../i18n/i18n-introduction.mdx), this special navbar item type will render a dropdown with all your site's available locales.

translations.zh-hant: 若啟用[國際化功能](../../i18n/i18n-introduction.mdx)，此特殊導覽列項目會顯示包含所有可用語言的下拉選單。

segments.source_content: The user will be able to switch from one locale to another, while staying on the same page.

translations.zh-hant: 使用者可切換不同語言版本，同時保持停留在相同頁面。

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `type` | `'localeDropdown'` | **Required** | Sets the type of this item to a locale dropdown. | | `position` | 'left' \| 'right' | `'left'` | The side of the navbar this item should appear on. | | `dropdownItemsBefore` | [LinkLikeItem](#navbar-dropdown)[] | `[]` | Add additional dropdown items at the beginning of the dropdown. | | `dropdownItemsAfter` | [LinkLikeItem](#navbar-dropdown)[] | `[]` | Add additional dropdown items at the end of the dropdown. |
If you use the [search](../../search.mdx), the search bar will be the rightmost element in the navbar.

translations.zh-hant: 若啟用[搜尋功能](../../search.mdx)，搜尋欄預設會出現在導覽列最右側。

segments.source_content: However, with this special navbar item type, you can change the default location.

translations.zh-hant: 透過此特殊項目類型，可自訂搜尋欄位置。

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `type` | `'search'` | **Required** | Sets the type of this item to a search bar. | | `position` | 'left' \| 'right' | `'left'` | The side of the navbar this item should appear on. | | `className` | `string` | / | Custom CSS class for this navbar item. |
You can also render your own HTML markup inside a navbar item using this navbar item type.

translations.zh-hant: 此項目類型允許在導覽列中直接渲染自訂HTML內容。

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `type` | `'html'` | **Required** | Sets the type of this item to a HTML element. | | `position` | 'left' \| 'right' | `'left'` | The side of the navbar this item should appear on. | | `className` | `string` | `''` | Custom CSS class for this navbar item. | | `value` | `string` | `''` | Custom HTML to be rendered inside this navbar item. |
You can enable this cool UI feature that automatically hides the navbar when a user starts scrolling down the page, and show it again when the user scrolls up.

translations.zh-hant: 啟用此UI特性後，當使用者向下滾動頁面時導覽列會自動隱藏，向上滾動時重新顯示。

segments.source_content: You can set the static Navbar style without disabling the theme switching ability. The selected style will always apply no matter which theme user have selected.

translations.zh-hant: 可設定靜態導覽列樣式而不影響主題切換功能。所選樣式將始終生效，不受使用者選擇的主題影響。

segments.source_content: Currently, there are two possible style options: `dark` and `primary` (based on the `--ifm-color-primary` color). You can see the styles preview in the [Infima documentation](https://infima.dev/docs/components/navbar/).

translations.zh-hant: 目前提供兩種樣式選項：`dark`（深色）與`primary`（基於`--ifma-color-primary`色值）。樣式預覽可參閱[Infima文件](https://infima.dev/docs/components/navbar/)。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus uses [Prism React Renderer](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/prism-react-renderer) to highlight code blocks. All configuration are in the `prism` object.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus採用[Prism React Renderer](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/prism-react-renderer)實現程式碼高亮，所有設定皆位於`prism`物件中。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `theme` | `PrismTheme` | `palenight` | The Prism theme to use for light-theme code blocks. |
| `darkTheme` | `PrismTheme` | `palenight` | The Prism theme to use for dark-theme code blocks. |
| `defaultLanguage` | `string` | `undefined` | The side of the navbar this item should appear on. |
| `magicComments` | `MagicCommentConfig[]` | _see below_ | The list of [magic comments](../../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx#custom-magic-comments). |

By default, we use [Palenight](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/prism-react-renderer/blob/master/packages/prism-react-renderer/src/themes/palenight.ts) as syntax highlighting theme. You can specify a custom theme from the [list of available themes](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/prism-react-renderer/tree/master/src/themes). You may also use a different syntax highlighting theme when the site is in dark mode.

translations.zh-hant: 預設使用[Palenight](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/prism-react-renderer/blob/master/packages/prism-react-renderer/src/themes/palenight.ts)語法高亮主題。可從[可用主題清單](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/prism-react-renderer/tree/master/src/themes)選擇自訂主題，並為深色模式指定不同高亮主題。

segments.source_content:
:::note

If you use the line highlighting Markdown syntax, you might need to specify a different highlight background color for the dark mode syntax highlighting theme. Refer to the [docs for guidance](../../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx#line-highlighting).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

若使用行高亮Markdown語法，可能需要為深色模式語法高亮主題指定不同的高亮背景色。詳見[行高亮說明文件](../../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx#line-highlighting)。

:::

segments.source_content: You can set a default language for code blocks if no language is added after the opening triple backticks (i.e. ```). Note that a valid [language name](https://prismjs.com/#supported-languages) must be passed.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以為程式碼區塊設定預設語言，當開頭三個反引號（即```）後未指定語言時使用。請注意必須傳入有效的[語言名稱](https://prismjs.com/#supported-languages)。

segments.source_content: You can add logo and a copyright to the footer via `themeConfig.footer`. Logo can be placed in [static folder](static-assets.mdx). Logo URL works in the same way of the navbar logo.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以透過`themeConfig.footer`添加標誌和版權聲明至頁尾。標誌可放置於[靜態資料夾](static-assets.mdx)中，其URL運作方式與導覽列標誌相同。

segments.source_content: | Name | Type | Default | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | `logo` | `Logo` | `undefined` | Customization of the logo object. See [Navbar logo](#navbar-logo) for details. | | `copyright` | `string` | `undefined` | The copyright message to be displayed at the bottom, also supports custom HTML. | | `style` | 'dark' \| 'light' | `'light'` | The color theme of the footer component. | | `links` | (Column \| FooterLink)[] | `[]` | The link groups to be present. |
You can add links to the footer via `themeConfig.footer.links`. There are two types of footer configurations: **multi-column footers** and **simple footers**.

translations.zh-hant: 您可透過`themeConfig.footer.links`添加連結至頁尾。頁尾配置有兩種型態：**多欄式頁尾**與**簡易頁尾**。

segments.source_content: Multi-column footer links have a `title` and a list of `FooterItem`s for each column.

translations.zh-hant: 多欄式頁尾連結需為每個欄位設定`title`及一組`FooterItem`清單。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `title` | `string` | `undefined` | Label of the section of these links. |
| `items` | `FooterItem[]` | `[]` | Links in this section. |

| Name | Type | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `label` | `string` | **Required** | Text to be displayed for this link. |
| `to` | `string` | **Required** | Client-side routing, used for navigating within the website. The baseUrl will be automatically prepended to this value. |
| `href` | `string` | **Required** | A full-page navigation, used for navigating outside of the website. **Only one of `to` or `href` should be used.** |
| `html` | `string` | `undefined` | Renders the HTML pass-through instead of a simple link. In case `html` is used, no other options should be provided. |
A simple footer just has a list of `FooterItem`s displayed in a row.

translations.zh-hant: 簡易頁尾僅需將一組`FooterItem`以單行排列顯示。

segments.source_content: You can adjust the default table of contents via `themeConfig.tableOfContents`.

translations.zh-hant: 您可透過`themeConfig.tableOfContents`調整預設目錄設定。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `minHeadingLevel` | `number` | `2` | The minimum heading level shown in the table of contents. Must be between 2 and 6 and lower or equal to the max value. |
| `maxHeadingLevel` | `number` | `3` | Max heading level displayed in the TOC. Should be an integer between 2 and 6. |
A React hook to access the color context. This context contains functions for setting light and dark mode and exposes boolean variable, indicating which mode is currently in use.

translations.zh-hant: 用於存取色彩模式的React鉤子。此上下文包含設定亮色/暗色模式的函式，並暴露布林值變數顯示當前使用模式。
